description: Princess Fatora`s lesbian lover (there is no indication in the narrative that they are closeted in any way), she is introduced when she returns to the royal palace after visiting her parents and sneaks into Fatora`s bedroom while Makoto (still dressed as Fatora) is in bed. When she learns the whole truth, she becomes worried for the real Fatora`s safety and assists Makoto and Fujisawa as they travel to see the three priestesses of Mt. Muldoon, serving as their guide.
name: Alielle Relryle
